articles.title: Dye-based Device Sees the Invisible - I-Connect007
articles.description: Scientists in Europe have designed an organic dye-based device that can see light waves in the shortwave infrared (SWIR) range. The device is easy to make using cheap materials, and is stable at high temperatures.
articles.content: Scientists in Europe have designed an organic dye-based device that can see light waves in the shortwave infrared (SWIR) range. The device is easy to make using cheap materials, and is stable at high… [+2325 chars]

articles.title: Frost and Sefcovic seek solutions for Northern Ireland Brexit issues - TheJournal.ie
articles.description: Brexit minister David Frost and European Commission vice-president Maros Sefcovic have met in Brussels.
articles.content:
TALKS HAVE TAKEN place about Northern Irelands post-Brexit arrangements amid warnings from MEPs that the breakdown in trust could derail the trade agreement between the UK and European Union.

articles.author: CNA
articles.title: WHO expects decision on emergency listing for Chinese-made COVID-19 vaccines soon - CNA
articles.description: ZURICH: The World Health Organization (WHO) will decide late this month or in May on emergency use listings for COVID-19 vaccines from Sinopharm and Sinovac following an extended review, a WHO European region official said on Thursday (Apr 15).
